themes: the Well / depth as a stored resource
fear of inadequacy (will my depth be valued?)
logic needs energy → frustration when 16 won’t experiment
long-term filling of the Well (3rd–4th line)

classical.hd_quote: An instinctive recognition of what is practical and deserves attention.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Goes inward, sorts what’s actually useful, builds depth quietly.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Feels unseen → judges its own depth as “insignificant.”

classical.hd_quote: The awareness that to successfully establish a new form one cannot neglect the most positive attributes.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Knows the solution is good only if the high-quality parts stay intact.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Fear of inadequacy → lets others degrade the pattern into decadence.

classical.hd_quote: Symbolized by the 'no-moon' phase where the potential of light is unrecognized, unavailable and unknowable.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Stays with its process even when no one sees or understands it.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Anxiety that its brilliance will stay buried → premature sharing.

classical.hd_quote: The good sense to take advantage of the restriction on short-term activity to assess the situation and restructure for long-term goals.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Uses slow periods to retool systems so the depth can finally be seen.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Resists restructuring → later must do it under pressure anyway.

classical.hd_quote: A natural urge to apply energy to action.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Brings the well’s depth to the public and says, “Let’s do it.”
interpretation.shadow_axis: Pushes action before the depth is mature → others lose trust.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Shares depth and is refueled by the sharing → endless well.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Holds back out of ‘why bother,’ weakening the value loop.

meta.provenance: Gate text and line texts taken verbatim (<25 words) from Ra Uru Hu, Line Companion (Archive.org) at the section on HEXAGRAM 48 THE WELL / DEPTH, lines 48.1–48.6: 48.1 Insignificance (L12552); 48.2 Degeneracy (L12595); 48.3 Incommunicado (L12640–L12642); 48.4 Restructuring (L12665–L12667); 48.5 Action (L12709–L12711); 48.6 Self-fulfillment (L12733–L12735). Interpretations are original behavioral mappings for the user’s S³ schema.
